articles.image_title: April 8, 2023, Berlin, Germany: Today, on April 8, 2023, in Berlin, protesters gathered at city hall Neukoelln to demonstrate against the 2023 Al-Aqsa clashes. These violent confrontations occurred between Palestinian worshippers and Israeli police at the Al-Aqsa Mosque in Jerusalem. Palestinian groups have condemned the attacks, while Israeli authorities have defended their actions as necessary for maintaining public order and safety. The protesters in Berlin chanted slogans like: ''From the river to the sea, Palestine will be free. (Credit Image: Â© Michael Kuenne/PRESSCOV via ZUMA Press Wire
